snippet.title: Wanderer: The Fragments of Fate - Official Developer Deep Dive Trailer | Perp Games VR Summer Showca
snippet.description: Join members of the development team at Mighty Eyes for a deep dive into Wanderer: The Fragments of Fate, including a discussion about the game's avatar system, platforming elements, new levels, upgrades to your companion, combat system, and more from this upcoming remake of the original Wanderer game. Wanderer: The Fragments of Fate is coming to PlayStation VR2, Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, Pico, and Steam VR.
